title: Can we pray Jummah with only 2 people? What is the minimum requirement? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: um can we play jummah with only two person because um uh because um we only have two persons okay that's one two uh i i got that from germany says can we pray jumu'ah only with two people the imam and one in the congregation the answer is no you have to pray the minimum for jummah is three imam and two people praying uh in the congregation [Music]
